#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
#include<string>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n;
    map<string,int> m;
    string s;
    map<string,int>::iterator it;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>s;
        if(m.find(s)==m.end())
            m[s]=1;
        else
        {
             it = m.find(s);
            it->second++;
        }
    }
    for(it=m.begin();it!=m.end();it++)
    {
        cout<<it->first;
        printf(" %d",it->second);
        printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
